casebody.data:
TOWN OF NAGS HEAD
v.
RICHARDSON, et al. 244A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Norman W. Shearin, Attorney at Law, David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Richardson, William W., et al M.H. Hood Ellis, Attorney at Law, Benjamin Marshall Gallop, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth City, for Town of Nags Head. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of August 2018 by Plaintiff to Dismiss and Strike Defendants' Cross-Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019." Davis, J. recused
